title: Astounding Studio, 1 Bath in Lincoln Park, Available: 9/1/2022
posting_body: Beautiful, spacious studio in the heart of Lincoln Park!

Unit features cooking gas included, rehabbed kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, spacious living area, great closet space, built in AC unit, hardwood floors, rehabbed bathroom, in unit laundry, and pets are welcome.
Convenient to transportation, shops, cafes and Lincoln Park hotspots!
Please Call Aleksandra Chadiev at 224/322-5494‬ to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention Apartment ID: 27339.
